alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:14AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Allen and southwestern Barren Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1014 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsville. This storm was moving east southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Allen and southwestern Barren Counties, including the following locations... Allen Springs, Oak Forest, West Fork, Maynard, Clare, Settle, Yesse, Raley Ford, Alonzo and Butlersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Kentucky. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Kentucky.
